title: Very well done
review: Wasn't expecting it to be this good. Well thought out interesting plot that entertains in a uniquely scripted way. Was kind of expecting a cookie cutter film but was very surprised at how good it was and that I hadn't heard more about this movie. I guess Jake G just doesn't have the mega pull of some other Hollywood heavyweights, but he did a great job here

title: Who thought of this?
review: The acting is good. The story is very much lacking movie material. Its basically looking at society as extremely troubled with no hope. I really don't know why anyone would turn this story into a movie script.

title: A really well constructed film
review: Great movie- the story is played out beautifully with fantastic performances by Crowe and Zelwiger and Paul Giamatti (spelling?) was fantastic. I would wholeheartedly recommend this one for boxing fans and history buffs as well as just fans of cinema. Enjoy
